meanings.definition: A disease caused by a fungus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with mycosis after finding a fungal infection.
meanings.sent2: Mycosis can be treated with antifungal medications.
meanings.sent3: The mycosis in the garden made the plants look like they were covered in white powder.
meanings.sent4: The spread of mycosis in the forest was like a slow invasion of tiny fungal soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The mycosis on the tree bark resembled a patchwork of moldy blankets.

meanings.definition: The presence of a fungus in or on the body.
meanings.sent1: She was concerned about the mycosis on her skin and sought treatment.
meanings.sent2: Proper hygiene can help prevent mycosis from developing on the body.
meanings.sent3: The mycosis on the bread made it look like a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The mycosis in the damp basement crept up the walls like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The pungent smell of mycosis filled the room, making everyone cringe.
